publ: by 深圳市幕落进出口有限公司
name: CZEview
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
CZEview can only be used with the same brand WiFi cameras, Please consult the seller before using this skill, to confirm that your product supports Alexa.
To start, follow these steps:
1.Install CZEview from App Store or Google Play, then add your camera to the CZEview and stay online.
2. Find CZEview in Alexa, click "Enable Skills" to link CZEview to your Alexa account and locate your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, Show Living Room.", acquire and monitor the camera's livestream.
